alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 5:10AM EST until December 21 at 11:17AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Water reaches the Maples area of Shelton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:31 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to gradually fall today eventually falling below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Wed 4 am: 12.4 Forecast: Wed 7 am 12.5 Wed 1 pm 12.1 Wed 7 pm 11.6 Thu 1 am 11.5 Thu 7 am 10.8 Thu 1 pm 10.8 Thu 7 pm 10.8 Fri 1 am 10.8 Fri 7 am 10.8 Fri 1 pm 10.3 Fri 7 pm 10.2 Sat 1 am 10.2 &&
